data.title: Woodburn Village Condos for Sale
data.meta_description: view Woodburn Villages condos for sale in Annandale VA. See active, pending, and sold listings. condo value report
data.text:
The Woodburn Village Condos For Sale - Annandale, VA

The Woodburn Village condos in Annandale, VA have been a part of the community for almost 50 years. In that time, the trees surrounding the property have grown to tower over the three-story structures. If you want to live in a forest setting, then Woodburn Village is the place to be. This is country living in the middle of a bustling city.

View all pending and closed sales in Woodburn Village condos!

Built in 1969, this red-brick multi-level condo has been called 'home' by many professionals who work in Washington D.C. Woodburn Village is only 12 miles from the nation's capital. While only a short drive, it can take up precious time driving in rush hour traffic.

Receive a property value quote for your Woodburn Village condo!

Transportation

Many locals take alternative transportation into the city. The Dunn Loring Metro Station is only two miles from the front door, offering a brisk walk for those who choose to leave their car at home instead of at the metro station. Both the Metro bus and Fairfax bus lines have stops about 100 yards from the front door, making it super easy to get around without using a car.

The Specifications

Located on about 40 acres of land, Woodburn Village has 606 one, two, three and four bedroom homes. Most units are two bedrooms, 1.5 baths - although some 2 bedroom units do have 2 full baths. In 2 bedroom homes, master bedrooms have the half bath, which is just the toilet and vanity, while main bathrooms have tub/shower combo. Master bedrooms also have spacious walk-in closets.

Large windows lighten up living areas. Kitchens have beautiful granite counter tops and brand-new appliances. Floors may be laminate, hardwood or carpeted in main living spaces. Kitchens and baths are tiles, while bedrooms are usually carpeted.The square footage in the homes in Woodburn Village ranges from 728 sq ft to almost 1,300 sq ft

The Amenities

Residents love the pool and clubhouse on-site. Surrounded by large trees, swimming in this pool feels like swimming at a resort or a state park. In fact, wandering around the property makes you feel as if you are on vacation, right in your own backyard! There are dozens of picnic tables placed around the property, with grills and trash cans provided for residents to enjoy their day and keep the property looking spectacular. The sprawling complex has pathways meandering throughout the area. Grassy areas surrounding each building, offering common grounds for you and your friends to gather and play.

A volleyball court, basketball court, and two tennis courts are available for those who wish to play. Many residents of Woodburn Village enjoy getting outdoors, and many enjoy spending time walking, biking, skating, or running along the fitness trail. At Woodburn, there is something for every age to enjoy outside the home.

Woodburn Village residents do have to use their vehicles to get the Tysons Corners Shopping Center, which is 5 miles away. Here they can buy food and drink, enjoy a movie, shop specialty shops and spend the day having fun.

A Dream Home

If you want country living in the city, then Woodburn Village is for you. This charming property has so much to offer its residents. Maybe this is the reason so many are happy to call this their 'dream house in the woods.'

Schedule a Tour for a Woodburn Village Condo!

Call me at 703-462-0700 or email me at DarrenRobertsonHomes@gmail.com to set up a time to see one of the properties currently for sale in this Annandale VA condo community. It’s important to work with an agent who sells a lot of condos and can help you navigate the different situations that come up during condo sales.
